data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Cagayan, Philippines.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Cagayan, Philippines

data.prayer: Jesus, make the 2,350,738 people in the state of Cagayan who claim to know you, brave enough to let the Bible weigh their thoughts and intentions today.
data.verse: For the word of God is living and powerful, and sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing even to the division of soul and spirit, and of joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Cagayan, Philippines today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 425,068 believers in Cagayan, Philippines a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Atta, Southern people.
Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Cagayan, Philippines.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Cagayan a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Cagayan.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.
